Lyrics: Las, je sçay bien que je feis grande offence
Poetic Translation: How truly great my sin was, I am now sure,

Lyrics: Quand je voulus contre amour tenir fort,
Poetic Translation: In trying to contend with Love so long.

Lyrics: Il m'en prend mal, aussi avois je tort
Direct Translation: See Mick Swithinbank's work at Choral Public Domain Library.
Poetic Translation: He serves me ill, but I was also wrong

Lyrics: De vouloir faire à ung dieu résistance
Poetic Translation: For wanting to resist a god whose power
Makes every creature in the world to cower.

Lyrics: Tant fist d'effort qu'il print d'assault mon cueur
Poetic Translation: He took my heart by storm with labored bouts,

Lyrics: Et meist le feu dedans à grand oultrance
Poetic Translation: Invaded to destroy as flames devour,

Lyrics: En lieu conquis, ainsi fait le vainqueur.
Poetic Translation: As does a king lay waste the land he routs.
